channel.title: Charts on Kpress R Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Charts on Kpress R Blog

item.title: Trust No One
item.description: In the last two episodes, I created an X-Files episode dataset and web-scraped episode scripts. Now it’s time for some real text analysis. Most of this is going to be based on Julia Silge’s work on tidy text mining, which can be found in her free eBook. And of course, all of this is based on the principles of tidy data - see this paper by tidyverse author Hadley Wickham for more details.
